definitions.definition: The unlawful taking of personal property as an attempt to deprive the legal owner of it permanently .
An individual instance of such a taking.
examples: That young man already has four assaults, a DUI, and a larceny on his record.

main_definition: ( law , uncountable ) The unlawful taking of personal property as an attempt to deprive the legal owner of it permanently . [from mid-15th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( law , countable ) An individual instance of such a taking.
